I've been busily and happily (obsessively?) capturing images from the 
RK manga (thanks to Grace!) of Saitou (up to 880, maybe 2/3 of the 
way through the Jinchuu arc) and ran into this.  This is the first 
time I've seen the manga in its original format and I'm running into 
things that either I hadn't noticed before or had forgotten.  I don't 
remember the men in the Tokyo jail gossiping about who Fujita really 
is.  Reminded me of discussions we've had about whether or not people 
in the department knew his true identity.

Anyway, I've uploaded that portion of page 19 from chapter 218 
(volume 25) of the manga into the Photos section.  Wasn't sure if it 
was appropriate to any of the folders, so it's just sitting there on 
its own.  Sweet little scene.

http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/shq/vwp?.dir=/&.src=gr&.dnm=rk_fu
jita_who_he_really_is.jpg&.view=t&.done=http%
